summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5460 for the improvement of 50th Avenue Northeast, from East 39th Street to a point 20 feet more or less, south of the south line of Lot 15, Block 12, Laurelhurst Heights Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 69357, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
